headline: Microchip price target lowered to $75 from $85 at B. Riley
summary: B. Riley analyst Craig Ellis lowered the firm’s price target on Microchip (MCHP) to $75 from $85 and keeps a Buy rating on the shares. The company’s fiscal Q3 beat the lowered guidance, but the Q4 outlook is well below estimates as Microchip looks to extinguish excess inventory, the analyst tells investors in a research note.
